Directions: Place the broccoli in a 1-1/2-qt. microwave-safe dish. Top with the chicken. In a bowl, combine the soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder and salt. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and microwave at 70% power for 8-10 minutes. Serve over rice.
Ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) bag frozen broccoli florets, thawed
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
